TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IResourceResponseBase

Docs.summary: Represents the non-resource specific service response headers returned by any request in the Azure Cosmos DB service.
Docs.remarks: Interface exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ActivityId As String

Docs.summary: Gets the activity ID for the request.
Docs.value: The activity ID for the request.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CollectionQuota As Long

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum quota for collection resources within an account.
Docs.value: The maximum quota for the account.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CollectionSizeQuota As Long

Docs.summary: Maximum size of a collection in kilobytes.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CollectionSizeUsage As Long

Docs.summary: Current size of a collection in kilobytes.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CollectionUsage As Long

Docs.summary: The current number of collection resources within the account.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentLocation As String

Docs.summary: The content parent location, for example, dbs/foo/colls/bar
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CurrentResourceQuotaUsage As String

Docs.summary: Gets the current size of this entity.
Docs.value: The current size for this entity. Measured in kilobytes for document resources and in counts for other resources.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DatabaseQuota As Long

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum quota for database resources within the account.
Docs.value: The maximum quota for the account.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DatabaseUsage As Long

Docs.summary: The current number of database resources within the account.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DocumentQuota As Long

Docs.summary: Maximum size of a documents within a collection in kilobytes.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DocumentUsage As Long

Docs.summary: Current size of documents within a collection in kilobytes.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IndexTransformationProgress As Long

Docs.summary: Gets the progress of an index transformation, if one is underway.
Docs.value: An integer from 0 to 100 representing percentage completion of the index transformation process. Returns -1 if the index transformation progress header could not be found.
Docs.remarks: An index will be rebuilt when the IndexPolicy of a collection is updated. This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LazyIndexingProgress As Long

Docs.summary: Gets the progress of lazy indexing.
Docs.value: An integer from 0 to 100 representing percentage completion of the lazy indexing process. Returns -1 if the lazy indexing progress header could not be found.
Docs.remarks: Lazy indexing progress only applies to the collection with indexing mode Lazy. This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MaxResourceQuota As String

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum size limit for this entity.
Docs.value: The maximum size limit for this entity. Measured in kilobytes for document resources and in counts for other resources.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PermissionQuota As Long

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum quota for permission resources within an account.
Docs.value: The maximum quota for the account.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PermissionUsage As Long

Docs.summary: The current number of permission resources within the account.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RequestCharge As Double

Docs.summary: Gets the request charge for this request.
Docs.value: The request charge measured in reqest units.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ResponseHeaders As NameValueCollection

Docs.summary: Gets the response headers.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ResponseStream As Stream

Docs.summary: Gets the underlying stream of the response.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SessionToken As String

Docs.summary: Gets the session token for use in sesssion consistency reads.
Docs.value: The session token for use in session consistency.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StatusCode As HttpStatusCode

Docs.summary: Gets the HTTP status code associated with the response.
Docs.value: The HTTP status code associated with the response.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StoredProceduresQuota As Long

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum quota of stored procedures for a collection.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StoredProceduresUsage As Long

Docs.summary: The current number of stored procedures for a collection.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TriggersQuota As Long

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum quota of triggers for a collection.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TriggersUsage As Long

Docs.summary: The current number of triggers for a collection.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserDefinedFunctionsQuota As Long

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum quota of user defined functions for a collection.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserDefinedFunctionsUsage As Long

Docs.summary: The current number of user defined functions for a collection.
Docs.value: Current number of user defined functions.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserQuota As Long

Docs.summary: Gets the maximum quota for user resources within an account.
Docs.value: The maximum quota for the account.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UserUsage As Long

Docs.summary: The current number of user resources within the account.
Docs.remarks: This is exposed for mocking purposes for the Azure Cosmos DB service.
